title: I won large t210 in lot REA.  I want to trade.
author: tonyetrade

posts.post_title: I won large t210 in lot REA.  I want to trade.
posts.post_content:
I won the lot of 180 or so in rea. I needed twenty one out of that lot.  The rest are available for trade.  I need t210 (mostly series 4 6 and 8), mayo baseball, e97 nicholls and moore.
thanks for viewing, tony
If you are interested in selling any I am interested.

[quote name="Epps" post=809360]If you are interested in selling any I am interested.[/QUOTE]

Ditto.
